data.text: @katewand It’s sad reading the comments. Fearful Ontarians mired in Stockholm syndrome, unable to see reality and move on with their lives.
@nicolewilliam @katewand Actually the are at war with a vaccine. It failed us and is now hospitalizing us.

@katewand @denisrancourt haha~ wanna bet??? try living in vancouver. The ''covid'' is ALIVE and THRIVING [DBLE MASKED AND RUBBER GLOVED folks at the shopping centre AND outside] and the ukraine flags everywhere. They're not gonna give any of it up easily.
@katewand @erdocAA They are paid to manipulate us!

@katewand It is amazing that the line of division over Covid measures is the exactly the same line of division over Ukraine. Simply put, some people will believe whatever is pushed down their throats by the politicians and MSM without learning anything.

@katewand @erdocAA Tomorrow’s headlines , Ukraine , Russia & 
Climate Change..
@katewand I think they're trying to remind us all who the big scary 'communist' is. 🙄 It's a common play from the 'How To Be A Successful Abuser' book. Deflect, deflect, deflect.
@nicolewilliam @katewand Nah. That war is over too. I work in a large hospital system in Midwest. No war
@katewand Yet the inalienable human rights we lost don't seem to be coming back
@katewand @denisrancourt covid is over maar cst  en muilkorf blijft
